title: Alpha Manhattan source
content:
A while back I posted the source to my MMF1.5 keen game/engine but nobody could open it because it was missing a few extensions that weren't available online.

I've managed to track down these extensions, so all of the ones you need that aren't included in a bonus pack or update are in a folder called 'extensions'. Install them in your MMF directory as needed.

Download: [url=http://spatang.com/random/amsrc.zip]spatang.com/random/amsrc.zip[/url][url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Alpha Manhattan source
content:
Nice to see; I've waited for this for quite some time.

Now I can finish Beta Chicago.-----------------------------------
